text.text_translated:
DART is a test. Its full name is Double Asteroid Redirection Test.
Scientists plan to test DART.
They will test it on a small moon.
This moon is called Didymoon.
Didymoon is 150 metres wide.
It orbits Didymos.
Didymos is its mother asteroid.
Didymos is 800 metres wide.
DART will hit Didymoon.
We hope this hit will push Didymoon.
It will move Didymoon out of its orbit.
Scientists want the orbit to change.
The change must be big enough.
Then telescopes on Earth can see the change.

DART is a test. Its full name is Double Asteroid Redirection Test.
Scientists plan to test DART.
They will test it on a small moon.
This moon is called Didymoon.
Didymoon is 150 metres wide.
It orbits Didymos.
Didymos is its mother asteroid.
Didymos is 800 metres wide.
DART will hit Didymoon.
We hope this hit will push Didymoon.
It will move Didymoon out of its orbit.
Scientists want the orbit to change.
The change must be big enough.
Then telescopes on Earth can see the change.
